title: Type 2 diabetes in childhood: building a platform to support novel intervention strategies
abstractText: The rise in childhood obesity has led to children developing obesity related type 2 diabetes, something that was never seen in the UK 20 years ago. We know that these children will get serious cardiovascular disease in adulthood; but we do not know what are the best treatments to prevent or delay the onset to these diseases. This proposal is to establish a UK national cohort of children with type 2 diabetes, carefully characterised, so that they can be involed in clinical trials of treatments to improve their outcomes.
